## [RatingItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item)

### Methods

|                                                                   Method                                                                    |                                         Return type                                          |                                                                                                                                                                               Brief description                                                                                                                                                                               |
|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [createResponse(response)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#createResponse(Integer))                   | [ItemResponse](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/item-response)      | Creates a new [ItemResponse](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/item-response) for this rating item.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [duplicate()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#duplicate())                                            | [RatingItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item)          | Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [getGeneralFeedback()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#getGeneralFeedback())                          | [QuizFeedback](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/quiz-feedback)      | Returns the feedback that is shown to respondents when they respond to a gradeable question.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [getHelpText()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#getHelpText())                                        | `String`                                                                                     | Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like [ImageItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/image-item), [PageBreakItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item), and [SectionHeaderItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/section-header-item)). |
| [getId()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#getId())                                                    | `Integer`                                                                                    | Gets the item's unique identifier.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [getIndex()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#getIndex())                                              | `Integer`                                                                                    | Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [getPoints()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#getPoints())                                            | `Integer`                                                                                    | Returns the point value of a gradeable item.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [getRatingIcon()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#getRatingIcon())                                    | [RatingIconType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-icon-type) | Gets the icon chosen for the rating.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [getRatingScaleLevel()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#getRatingScaleLevel())                        | `Integer`                                                                                    | Gets the rating's scale level.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [getTitle()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#getTitle())                                              | `String`                                                                                     | Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a [SectionHeaderItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/section-header-item)).                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [getType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#getType())                                                | [ItemType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/item-type)              | Gets the item's type, represented as an [ItemType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/item-type).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [isRequired()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#isRequired())                                          | `Boolean`                                                                                    | Determines whether the respondent must answer the question.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [setGeneralFeedback(feedback)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#setGeneralFeedback(QuizFeedback))      | [RatingItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item)          | Sets the feedback to be shown to respondents when they respond to a gradeable question that doesn't have a correct or incorrect answer (ie questions that require manual grading).                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [setHelpText(text)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#setHelpText(String))                              | [RatingItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item)          | Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like [ImageItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/image-item), [PageBreakItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item), and [SectionHeaderItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/section-header-item)). |
| [setPoints(points)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#setPoints(Integer))                               | [RatingItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item)          | Sets the number of points a gradeable item is worth.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [setRatingIcon(ratingIcon)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#setRatingIcon(RatingIconType))            | [RatingItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item)          | Sets the rating's icon.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [setRatingScaleLevel(ratingScaleLevel)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#setRatingScaleLevel(Integer)) | [RatingItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item)          | Sets the rating's maximum scale level.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [setRequired(enabled)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#setRequired(Boolean))                          | [RatingItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item)          | Sets whether the respondent must answer the question.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [setTitle(title)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item#setTitle(String))                                   | [RatingItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/rating-item)          | Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a [SectionHeaderItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/section-header-item)).                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
